glow_services-2.title: Our Services
glow_services-2.description: At the Beauty Parlour, we believe in beauty with a conscience. We have created a salon that offers the highest quality hair services in a setting that is healthier for the environment, our guests and our staff.

glow_call_to_action-2.title: Special Discount!
glow_call_to_action-2.description: We are offering a special discount on the Occasion of Opening Ceremony of our Parlor. You could be lucky winner to get one month of free service.

text-2.title: About Us
text-2.text: We believe in beauty with a conscience. We have created a salon that offers the highest quality hair services in a setting that is healthier for the environment, our guests and our staff.
